org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure

Class SimpleCoauthorGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.AbstractCoauthorGraph
      • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.SimpleCoauthorGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DblpInterface

    public class SimpleCoauthorGraph
extends AbstractCoauthorGraph
    A simple coauthor graph implementation. This implementation constructs the whole graph in main memory at time of construction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Field Detail

      • EMTPY_DBLP

        public static final DblpInterface EMTPY_DBLP
        An empty DBLP. Used mainly for testing code without building an actual graph object.
